summary: Uuno Turhapuro is a man who can convince anyone of anything by simply talking them into submission. Uuno learns to play the violin and becomes famous, but discovers that fame is both a gift and a curse.
cast: Vesa-Matti Loiri|Marjatta Raita|Spede Pasanen|Juhani Kumpulainen|Simo Salminen|Mirjam Himberg|Leila Itkonen|Anna-Liisa Ruotsi|Rauni Ikäheimo|Tiia Louste|Hellevi Seiro|Aarno Sulkanen|Kaarina Tuunanen|Nipa Niemi|Eeva-Liisa Haimelin|Ari Laine|Mari Alakoski|Antti Einiö|Jukka Virtanen|Titta Jokinen|Mona Loiri|Pirjo Honkasalo|Jorma Kairavuo|Seppo Kohvakka|Ere Kokkonen|Eero Lietola|Klaus Relander
title: Uuno Turhapuro
